Text: Wood Mackenzie is forecasting 12.6 GWdc of solar will be installed this year and has reduced its utility scale forecast due to completion of many projects being pushed out to next year or later.
Cause: completion of many projects being pushed out to next year or later.
Effect: Wood Mackenzie is forecasting 12.6 GWdc of solar will be installed this year and has reduced its utility scale forecast
Sentence: <e2>Wood Mackenzie is forecasting 12.6 GWdc of solar will be installed this year and has reduced its utility scale forecast</e2> due to <e1>completion of many projects being pushed out to next year or later.</e1>
